Strings.Text:
There is a sign which prohibits 
entry. {pause}{clear}It reads, “Temporary the area is 
closed due to the maintenance {pause}{clear}check of the 3rd Energy 
Reactor”.{pause}
The aqueduct shutters which \nlead to the 3rd Energy Reactor {pause}{clear}are already open.{pause}
It's a control terminal for \noperating the aqueduct shutters {pause}{clear}which lead to the 3rd Energy \nGenerator.{pause}{clear}Will you operate it?{0x3000}
To operate the control panel you \nneed the shutter control plug.{pause}
The aqueduct shutters which \nlead to the 3rd Energy Reactor {pause}{clear}are already open.{pause}
